Southwest Center
Driving Directions

From the Phoenix airport to the DoubleTree

Take Interstate 10 east for about 100 miles. Exit at 22nd Street, and turn left. After about 4 miles, turn left onto Alvernon Way. After half a mile, the hotel will be on the right.

From the Phoenix airport to the Marriott

Take Interstate 10 east for about 100 miles. Exit at Speedway Blvd. and turn left. After about 1.5 miles, turn right on Euclid Ave. and then left on Second Street. The hotel is on your right and there is a garage on your left.

From the Phoenix airport to the Sheraton (under renovation)

Take Interstate 10 east for about 100 miles. Exit at Speedway Blvd. and turn left. After about 2 miles, you will arrive at the corner of Speedway and Campbell Ave. The hotel is on the southeast corner (on your far right).

From the Phoenix airport to the Math Department

Take Interstate 10 east for about 100 miles. Exit at Speedway Blvd. and turn left. After about 2 miles, turn right on Campbell Ave. and then right again on Sixth Street (the second light). After 2 lights and about 100 yards there is an entrance to a garage on the right. The math department is in the 7-story building directly north of the east end of the garage.
